Posts.Content: jillor1118 wrote: I am a breast cancer survivor who works for a medical market research company. We are currently looking for non-metaststic breast cancer survivors who have had the Oncotype DX test since April 2008 to participate in a telephone interview. The interview takes about 30 minutes and you would receive $75 for your participation. We would need to ask a few preliminary questions as some of our profiles have been filled. If interested or if you have any questions,please call 1-800-868-4206 and ask for reference #DXJ. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Market Research interviews being conducted jillor1118 otter
